Rent Friends (1994 - 2003)

  • General info
Synopsis:
One of the most popular American series ever produced Friends details the lives of six friends living in New York City. In a purple apartment overlooking Central Park Monica Geller (Courtney Cox) and Rachel Green (Jennifer Aniston) try to build lasting relationships with men, whilst their hippy friend Phoebe Buffet (Lisa Kudrow) and Monicaâ€™s brother Ross (David Schwimmer) attempt to manage their unusual family lives. Sarcastic Chandler (Matthew Perry) and stud Joey (Matt le Blanc) complete the set of comedic but loveable coffee drinkers.
Actors:
Jennifer Aniston, Kevin Bright, David Crane, Marta Kauffman, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry, Peter Bonerz, David Schwimmer, Elliott Gould, Christine Taylor, Brian Buckner, John Allen Nelson, Billy Stevenson, Clea Lewis, Cleo King, Greg Malins, Teri Garr, Morgan Fairchild
